oracle.spatial.hadoop.vector.mapreduce.job

Class KMeansClustering<K,V>

  • java.lang.Object
    • Configured
      • oracle.spatial.hadoop.vector.mapred.job.BaseJob<K,V>
        • oracle.spatial.hadoop.vector.mapred.job.KMeansClustering<K,V>
          • oracle.spatial.hadoop.vector.mapreduce.job.KMeansClustering<K,V>
  • Type Parameters:
    K - the type of the input keys
    V - the type of the input values

    public class KMeansClustering<K,V>
extends KMeansClustering<K,V>
    Class used to perform spatial clustering over an input data set.The clustering is performed running one or more jobs iteratively.
    Author:
    hsaucedo

      • runIterations

        public boolean runIterations(int maxIterations,
                             Configuration baseConf)
                      throws java.lang.Exception
        Runs the K Means clustering algorithm using the given configuration
        Overrides:
        runIterations in class KMeansClustering<K,V>
        Parameters:
        maxIterations - the maximum number of iterations. If zero is passed, a default value based on the number of clusters will be used
        baseConf - the job configuration
        Returns:
        true if the algortihm was successful
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception
